sentences.en: ...a room, high and square with carpet underfoot and tapestries on the walls.
sentences.cn: ...天花板很高的一间四方的房间，脚下有地毯，墙上有挂毯。

sentences.en: Deep slush underfoot made her shoes wet.
sentences.cn: 脚下很深的雪水弄湿了她的鞋.

sentences.en: He trod the golden beetle underfoot.
sentences.cn: 他把一只金色的甲虫踩在脚下.

sentences.en: Her three children are always getting underfoot.
sentences.cn: 她的三个孩子老是碍手碍脚.

sentences.en: Ice made the path slippery underfoot.
sentences.cn: 路上结了冰,走起来很滑.

sentences.en: Morgan dropped his cigarette and crushed it underfoot.
sentences.cn: 摩根把香烟丢到地上，用脚踩灭。

sentences.en: People were trampled underfoot in the rush for the exit.
sentences.cn: 有人在拼命涌向出口时被踩在脚下。

sentences.en: The beach was strewn with countless shells, and they crumbled underfoot.
sentences.cn: 海滨贝壳密集, 它们在脚下被踩得粉碎.

sentences.en: The bluebells were so thick underfoot that it was impossible not to tread on them.
sentences.cn: 脚底下到处都是风信子,根本没法不踏在花上面.

sentences.en: The carpet of pine needles was soft underfoot.
sentences.cn: 脚下厚厚的松针踩上去软绵绵的。

sentences.en: The crowd stampeded and many were crushed or trampled underfoot.
sentences.cn: 人群争先恐后地奔逃，很多人被压伤或踩踏。

sentences.en: The ground was dry and firm underfoot.
sentences.cn: 脚下踩的土地又干又硬。
雪在脚下发出嘎吱嘎吱的声音。

sentences.en: They were in a clearing, completely surrounded by bushes, the turf underfoot was clean and springy.
sentences.cn: 他们来到一片空地, 四周是灌丛, 脚下是干净、松软的草坪.

sentences.en: Thousands of victims perished, trampled underfoot.
sentences.cn: 数以千计的受害者遭踩踏致死。

trans.tran_cn: 在脚下，在地上，碍事地，挡路地
trans.tran_en: under your feet where you are walking
